Name: Lily
Introduction: Lily grew up good at studying but wasn’t good at building relationships. She joined a law firm after graduating with a law degree. She met someone she liked there, but didn't know how to express it. She lives with internal struggles every day but doesn't know how to release it.

EvilList.title: Animal abuse.
EvilList.explain: Those animals were already sick, and I just wanted to end their pain as soon as possible.

EvilList.title: Murdering a colleague.
EvilList.explain: She got what she deserved, I liked that boy and she still talked to him.

EvilList.title: Stealing money.
EvilList.explain: I didn't steal it. She lost it.

EndingHeaven: You have made a fair and just decision.
EndingHall: What! That’s impossible! I need to talk to your supervisor!
